channel.title: Coding on Bastian Gruber

item.title: Git proficiency with rebase
item.description: I am a developer now for more than 10 years. Except a few years with SVN, I was solely working with Git. The best quote I got from one of my CTOs in the early days, was: “Git is like the whole world, but we need just the size of a lake of it.” You mainly use: git clone git pull git push git add git commit git checkout and git checkout -b That’s mostly it, right?
